name: BeyondPresence Sales Opportunity Scoring - Real-Time Lead Intelligence

parameters.content:
## ðŸŽ¯ Sales Opportunity Scoring System

**What This Does:**
- Monitors BeyondPresence user messages in real-time
- Scores leads based on buying signals
- Detects competitor mentions instantly
- Estimates potential deal size
- Sends intelligent alerts to Slack

**Setup Required:**
1. Configure Slack OAuth2 credentials
2. Update channel names in Slack nodes
3. Add BeyondPresence webhook URL

## ðŸ“Š Scoring Logic

**Buying Signals (+Points):**
- "interested" / "tell me more" (+20)
- "budget" / "pricing" (+15)
- "timeline" / "when" (+15)
- "demo" / "trial" (+25)
- "decision maker" (+30)
- "purchase" / "buy" (+30)

**Negative Signals (-Points):**
- "too expensive" (-20)
- "not interested" (-30)
- "just looking" (-15)
- "maybe later" (-10)

## ðŸ”” Slack Alerts

**Automatic Notifications:**
- ðŸ”¥ Hot leads (score > 70)
- âš¡ Competitor mentions
- ðŸ’° Large deal indicators
- ðŸ“ˆ Buying signal clusters
- ðŸš¨ At-risk opportunities

**Smart Threading:**
- Groups messages by call ID
- Shows conversation context
- Tracks score progression

parameters.content:
## ðŸ”§ Configuration Steps

**1. Slack OAuth2 Setup:**
- Go to Credentials â†’ New
- Select "Slack OAuth2 API"
- Follow OAuth flow
- Grant channel write permissions

**2. Update Channel Names:**
- Hot Leads 
- Competitors 
- Qualified
- Summaries

**3. Customize Competitors:**
- Edit "Score Sales Opportunity"
- Add your competitor names
- Adjust scoring weights

**4. Test Webhook:**
- Use webhook test URL
- Send sample user message
